title: Trump Attacks the Mayor of San Juan: A Closer Look | Salman Rushdie | Celeste Ng
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the very real consequences of electing a lazy, ignorant racist as president.
Then, Seth speaks to authors Salman Rushdie and Celeste Ng. After Seth's interviews, Late Night producers Henry Melcher and Sarah Jenks-Daly continue the conversations backstage with the writers exclusively for this podcast.
